title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.32 - Fueling to be conducted at least 50 feet from buildings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.32 - Fueling to be conducted at least 50 feet from buildings

State Regulations

Aircraft fuel handling at an air terminal shall be
conducted at least 50 feet from any hangar or other building, except where the
location of underground fuel tanks presently installed requires such fuel
handling closer to existing buildings or hangars. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
